Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Eidenhoft Boulevard, east of the Adrilite Museum.
Room.LongDescription: The Adrilite Museum of Natural History gives a concise and complete look at the various stages of life in various parts of the world from the strange and exotic, to the downright deadly. The museum entrance is located on the west side of the building off of Marina Way. A row of quaint, multicolored small buildings line the west side of the road.
